code: import{useMemo}from"react";import{useAppSelector}from"./hooks";import{selectCurrentUser}from"state/auth/authSlice";import{selectAvatar}from"state/auth/authSlice";export var useAuth=function useAuth(){var user=useAppSelector(selectCurrentUser);return useMemo(function(){return{user:user};},[user]);};export var useAvatar=function useAvatar(){var avatar=useAppSelector(selectAvatar);return useMemo(function(){return{avatar:avatar};},[avatar]);};
